topic.title: FBI Drops its Case Against Apple
topic.body:
https://threatpost.com/fbi-drops-its-case-against-apple/116918/
Yeah find some smaller players to pester fucking FBI.
Apple will sell even more phones....

1_1JQmAwSmx4VFEbYchZGAwqC9QppdKBENsb.body:
> [splitfire](#comment_4_14gGPfCHoaUU7PizjB6PaUmM6pZ5YV5H4f): https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/zeronet-git works perfectly for me. try to read entire thread there

so true  :)

1_1FQzw6BBWb8DqSgT3uMsMpcWu3uz48bEDX.body:
> [plavojabuka](#comment_2_158KZsYQsNp4j4kiPrkqXvTPRewEXeP24W): the creator of that site put up the private key so that the community could publish whatever they wanted to that site.   if you look at  data/1FqhRosMouo37Z8iDpLTEPvfznBq1b4N4w/index.html you can see that someone just edited the html to be that pic which can be found with a quick google search.tl:dr the fbi didnt seize anything its just a pic.

x2 look at the pic.name didn't even toke the courtesy to rename it properly 2

Well whatever the deal is they turbo fixed the known flaws :)
https://threatpost.com/apple-patches-serious-imessage-crypto-flaws/116906/

2_16odYTnUpF26qivssGsSuwpLgdMQkvK8qh.body:
Targeting innocent working people is the lowest form of getting a message out. 
Even Rats are smarter.

4748_1KbV1e1u6P6AsY8XNBydgtbtN8iSB5WMyG.body: fuck the dutch mentality, remember diginotar ssl's, there all short term thinking wannabe's and will bravely do what the established order will ask of them.
